Html:
Hello,

I am getting this error after following the documentation to manually setup my project to use this library.

I have a WPF 4.5 project and it does run, but I keep seeing this errors and VS designer cannot show my UI.

The same error is happening to the <mui:Link /> elements.

How can I fix that?

Thank you,

Igor.
Looks like the FirstFloor.ModernUI.dll reference is missing in your project. Is that the case?

Hello,

In fact it is not. The library is already added.

I managed to solve the problem by installing the NuGet package instead.

Thank you anyway,

Igor.

To fix the issue go the following:

Right click on the zip you downloaded.
Choose properties.
In the general tab click on unblock. Then apply and ok
Now unzip the package.
